Package main.gui

Class MainScreenGui

java.lang.Object
main.gui.MainScreenGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class MainScreenGui extends Object implements UserInterface
class for Main window after setup

    • athleteSwitchingNum1

      private int athleteSwitchingNum1
      Next three ints indicate the Athlete buttons is clicked when int is -1, button is not clicked when int is greater than 0(inclusive), it is clicked this number will be used as index number to call or swap athletes.

    • athleteSwitchingNum2

      private int athleteSwitchingNum2
      Next three ints indicate the Athlete buttons is clicked when int is -1, button is not clicked when int is greater than 0(inclusive), it is clicked this number will be used as index number to call or swap athletes.

    • usingItemNum

      private int usingItemNum
      Indicate the item button is clicked when int is -1, button is not clicked when int is greater than 0(inclusive), it is clicked this number will be used as index number to use an item.

    • isRandomLeave

      private boolean isRandomLeave
      boolean value that shows if there was random athlete leave event

      boolean value that shows if there was random athlete join event

      boolean value that shows if there was random athlete upgrade event

    • swapAthleteSlots

      private void swapAthleteSlots(int slotNum)
      when the swapOn switch is ON, swap two athletes when player click two athletes and refresh screen to show changes and cancel clicked toggle buttons if swapOn switch is off, just show the clicked athlete's information
      Parameters:
      slotNum - type of integer which indicate slot number of ArrayList

    • selectingResetItemSlots

      private void selectingResetItemSlots(int slotNum)
      this is help function to implement cancelItemToggle() method and assign slot number that player clicked
      Parameters:
      slotNum - the type of int that indicate slot number of arrayList

    • checkInjured

      private void checkInjured()
      check if the athlete is injured, if it is, show with red text

    • refreshWindow

      private void refreshWindow()
      update screen with the latest information. there is a chance to have random event

    • cancelAthleteToggle

      private void cancelAthleteToggle()
      this is help fuction to cancel all the athlete toggle buttons and reset athlete index number

    • cancelItemToggle

      private void cancelItemToggle()
      this is help fuction to cancel all the item toggle buttons and reset item index number

    • setButton

      private void setButton()
      set buttons on main screen

    • setAthleteItemInfoPanel

      private void setAthleteItemInfoPanel()
      set the information panel for athlete and item on main screen

    • checkingTakeABye

      private void checkingTakeABye()
      create an option panel to ask whether the player really wants to move to next week. if the player can't do more game or weeks are finished or just wants to quit, show game over window

    • checkingGameOver

      private void checkingGameOver()
      check if the player really wants to quit this game without finishing.

    • isRandomEvent

      private boolean isRandomEvent()
      check if the randome event has occured. if it hasn't occured, make athlete randomly leave from the player's team.
      Returns:
      true if event is occurred

    • exitBox

      private void exitBox()
      create an option panel to ask whether the player really wants to quit the game or not

    • athleteRandomLeft

      private void athleteRandomLeft()
      create panel to notify the player that some athlete has left. This is random occasion.

    • athleteRandomJoin

      private void athleteRandomJoin()
      create panel to notify the player that some athlete joined the team. This is random occasion.

    • athleteRandomUpgrade

      private void athleteRandomUpgrade()
      create panel to notify the player that some athlete has left. This is random occasion.

    • closeWindow

      public void closeWindow()
      close Main window ( it will be called from gameEnvironment)

    • finishedWindow

      public void finishedWindow()
      close Main window
